sourcesContent:
import PopupWithForm from "../popupWithForm/PopupWithForm"

export default function AddPlacePopup({isOpen, onClose, isUpdating, onAddPlace}) {

    return (
        <PopupWithForm
        name="add-place"
        title="Новое место"
        button="Создать"
        isOpen={isOpen}
        onClose={closeAllPopups}
        isUpdating={isUpdating}
      >
        <fieldset className="popup__set">
          <label className="popup__form-label">
            <input
              type="text"
              className="popup__item popup__item_type_place-name"
              placeholder="Название"
              defaultValue=""
              name="place__name"
              id="place"
              required=""
              minLength={2}
              maxLength={30}
            />
            <span className="popup__input-error place-error" />
          </label>
          <label className="popup__form-label">
            <input
              type="url"
              className="popup__item popup__item_type_link"
              placeholder="Ссылка на картинку"
              defaultValue=""
              name="place__link"
              id="link"
              required=""
            />
            <span className="popup__input-error link-error" />
          </label>
        </fieldset>{" "}
      </PopupWithForm>
    )
}
